name: Jishin
description:
Jishin
Jishin (地震), meaning "earthquake" in Japanese, is a tower defense game where the ground is anything but stable. As waves of relentless enemies surge towards your base, you'll not only need to strategically build towers, but also adapt to the ever-shifting battlefield.

Brace Yourself for the Tremor:

Each wave brings a devastating earthquake, shaking up the map! You will have to decide to move your main base, or take DAMAGE!

Build a Defence:

You will have to build a defence against enemies that come in waves to survive! You will fight for your bases life and see if you can hold your own!

Jishin challenges you to think beyond tower placement. Can you weather the tremors and beat a high score?
